text: Donny Carr Lambeth (born 1950) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/136318/donny- lambeth#.VWvJAmTBzGc He represents the 75th district. == North Carolina General Assembly == Lambeth has served three terms in the North Carolina House of Representatives. Education Lambeth voted for the 2017 budget that did not provide teachers with a stipend for out-of-pocket expenses. Over half of teachers in North Carolina have second jobs. NC has improved its rank from 41st in 2017 to 29th in the country for teacher pay and 2nd in the SouthEast two years later. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:1965 births Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Donny Lambeth
